name: BB Zinfandel
blurb: What's rich and seductive and comes in a black box? We can think of many things including this BB Zinfandel

name: Blue Eyes
blurb: Look into the wolf's eyes and see the wine of your dreams

name: The Kiss
blurb: It's like a kiss from a grape vine

name: Fracture
blurb: Often described as a Booker flagship, Fracture is one of the worldâ€™s great Syrahs. Only the softest Syrah in barrel makes the cut for this dense and powerful wine.

name: Rose
blurb: Tastes of summer with hints of watermellon and strawberry.

name: Antiqua
blurb: Any storm for a port. Perfect to top of dinner or top off some vanilla ice cream.

name: Chardonnay
blurb: This pure stainless Chardonnay has bright apple and apricot notes.

name: Villa Wolff Dry Reisling
blurb: Pure stony fruit and medium body with a light and crisp finish.

name: Cabernet Sauvignon
blurb: This full bodied red has juicy cherry and plum notes.
